title: Didn't recieve Icon/Banner for crafting Spirit Guard Udyr
body: Couldn't submit a ticket about this, so I'm just posting about it here. As the title says I crafted SGU recently, but I didn't recieve any icons or banners with it.

replies.body: Same here bro just crafted it and didnt have them for some reason ... And also for me the site were i should submit a request is not working >.>{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
